name.ja: <ruby>背信聖徒<rt>アザミナ・レア</rt></ruby>シルヴィア

text.en:
1 Illusion monster + 1 LIGHT Spellcaster monster
Any battle damage your "Azamina" monsters other than "Azamina Rhea Silvera" inflict to your opponent is doubled. You can only use each of the following effects of "Azamina Rhea Silvera" once per turn. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate that effect. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Sinful Spoils" Trap from your Deck to your hand.
